title: E586DSâ€™s signal is weak and cannot register to 3G network.
answer:
1. Please check local network condition, check whether there is 3G network which provided by telecom operator at the moment. Ensure you are not in some close environment. (You may check the signal strengthen by the icon displayed on Web UI main page)

2. Please move E586DS toward to window to get better signal
3. If the network condition is good but still cannot register, please try to reset E586DS and try again
4. Sometimes E586DS will be rejected by the operator for some reasons. Please reset E586DS and check. If E586DS still cannot camp on the network, please contact with your device provider.
5. Login Web UI to check whether E586DS has been set to GPRS only mode. If your E586DS has been set to GPRS Only, please select the WCDMA Prefer option in the drop down menu.
